TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PickBranch extends System.Object

Docs.summary: A potential path of execution within a activity.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A PickBranch contains a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.PickBranch.Trigger%2A> and an <xref:System.Activities.Statements.PickBranch.Action%2A>. At the beginning of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Pick> elementâ€™s execution, all the trigger activities from all PickBranch elements are scheduled. When the first (leftmost) activity completes, the corresponding action activity is scheduled, and all other trigger activities are canceled.
## Examples The following code sample demonstrates creating a PickBranch activity. This example is from the [Using the Pick Activity](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) sample.
[!code-cs[wfs_Pick#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/pick/program.cs#1)]
